liquidation_threshold.description: Liquidation threshold amount in stable denom. When the current collaterals value is smaller than the threshold, all callterals will be liquidated

min_liquidation.description: Minimum liquidation amount. If a liquidation amount is below than this value, exclude the asset from the liquidation process

safe_ratio.description: borrow_amount / borrow_limit must always be bigger than safe_ratio.

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
